column5: I,ll bet they will think your santa all year.LOL  Congrats.   I remember my great grandparents on my pops side well.  Boy,she could cook and a great gardener of roses. If Im not mistaken, both my boys were probly 7&8 yoa when she past. We took them to see her many times a year. They never got to meet my great grandfather.
That is wonderful news Bruce! Congratulations to all.
Congrats Grandpa
Great news!
Just got home from the hospital. Erika weighed in at 8lb 6oz late last night. that makes grandaughter #4.
Congrats.   Keep going ...   We have nine of 'em.
Keep going we have 8 all under 7
Congrats. The big family Christmas get togethers are always the best.
:clapping: ... I have none...so I bought a dog!!
Congrats!
Congratulatons to you and the family.

Congrats Bruce. 11 grandkidlets here. Only one great grand daughter. Don't think we'll be having anymore grand kids. The youngest grandchild is 20. Great grand daughter will be 3 in March....I hope she remembers us after we're gone. It's not too often that people can say that they remember playing with their great grandparents.
Congrat's, what a great Christmas present!

Congrats Bruce. 11 grandkidlets here. Only one great grand daughter. Don't think we'll be having anymore grand kids. The youngest grandchild is 20. Great grand daughter will be 3 in March....I hope she remembers us after we're gone. It's not too often that people can say that they remember playing with their great grandparents. That's amazing Roy.
Woot woot!!!!  Congrats!!!!  Awesome news???
Wonderful!

Congrats Bruce. 11 grandkidlets here. Only one great grand daughter. Don't think we'll be having anymore grand kids. The youngest grandchild is 20. Great grand daughter will be 3 in March....I hope she remembers us after we're gone. It's not too often that people can say that they remember playing with their great grandparents. I hope to be as lucky as you, someday, to see and play with great grandchildren.
Congrats
Congratulations Bruce...  Roy: I am sure my 10 year old great-grandson will remember fishing with my grandson (his father) and me...
Congrats on the new member of the family.  Awesome!  We have 3 grandchildren age 14 years, 5 years & the newest member is 8 months
Congrats!
CONGRATS TO YOU ALL BRUCE!  Great name too (my wife is also Erika with a 'k')
Thanks for all the best wishes ,gang.  Just hope I can be 1/2 as good at being a grandparent as my own grandparents were.
Congrats Bruce - a cause for a true Thanks-giving
Im sure youll be great Bruce!!!!
You've had some tough times Bruce, this ain't one of them.  Congrats.
Congratulations!
Thanks for all the best wishes ,gang.  Just hope I can be 1/2 as good at being a grandparent as my own grandparents were.  I have no doubt, Bruce.
Congratulations to you and all your family Bruce !!
